tourName: Uzbekistan holiday,wonders of the Silk Road
generalInfo: After arriving in Tashkent you will fly to Bukhara and transfer to Khiva to start your journey, working back through Bukhara, Kyzyl-Kum desert, Samarkand and back to Tashkent. The programme is full of Silk Road culture, unique to Uzbekistan, religious, historical and nature and you will meet the Uzbek people who are proud of their cultural background. It is a unique and enjoyable programme, delivered by our local guides, to give you a taste of this special part of the World.

dayInfo.description: London to Tashkent. Arrival to Tashkent in the morning from direct flight from London. Meeting at the airport by guide, transfer to hotel, accommodation, overnight, breakfast and rest. Afternoon sightseeing tour in Tashkent: Khast Imam Complex, Chorsu Bazaar and Kukeldash Madrasah. Visit to the modern part of the city: Mustakillik Square (Independence Square), Alisher Navoi Theater and square, Amir Temur Monument and Square. Overnight in Tashkent hotel – choice of premium, luxury boutique or affordable 3*

Tashkent to Urgench/Khiva. Transfer to airport for morning flight to Urgench, flight approx. at 07:00-08:40am. Transfer to Khiva (30 minutes’ drive) and to the hotel and then sightseeing in Khiva: Ancient city Ichan Qala with its ancient palaces, mosques and madrasas, mausoleums, minarets and caravanserais, local bazaar and workshops of local artisans. Overnight in Khiva hotel
Khiva to Bukhara. Transfer from Khiva to Bukhara (7-7.5 hours) crossing the Kyzylkum desert. Lunch in the roadside café. Arrival into Bukhara at approx. 16:00 hours. Overnight in Bukhara hotel

Bukhara. Day of sightseeing in Bukhara: The Samanids Mausoleum, Chashma-Ayub Mausoleum, Kalyan Mosque, Kalyan Minaret, Miri-Arab Madrassah, Chor-Minor Madrassah, Modari-khan Madrassah, Ulugbek Madrassah, Lyabi-Hauz Architectural Complex, Magoki-Attori Mosque, Bolo-Khauz Mosque, Monumental Shopping Arcades, The Ark Fortress. Overnight in Bukhara hotel

Bukhara. Sightseeing outside of Bukhara: visit to Sitorai Mokhi Hosa – Summer palace of last Emir, Chor Bakr ancient memorial complex, Bakhoutdin Nakshbandi mausoleum. Today you will have culinary master class in an Uzbek family house – you will learn to cook Uzbek traditional food under the guidance of master of the house and have dinner together. Overnight in Bukhara hotel

Bukhara to Yangikazgan. Transfer to Yangikazgan area, Kyzyl-Kum desert. You will accommodate in yurts. Desert is one of untouched by human life places on Earth. Kyzyl-Kum is fifth largest sandy desert in the World and it is amazingly beautiful. Yurts and camels – “ships of desert” remain unchanged in desert for centuries. People in the East believe that camel is the most beautiful animal in the world. Even the words "camel" and "beauty" in Arabic language are cognate. Here you can ride a camel, walk around and watch the desert fauna. You will enjoy open air dinner and music show of Akyn – local singer. Overnight in Yurts

Yangikazgan to Samarkand. In the morning you will go to Aydarkul – a blue lake among the Kyzyl-Kum sands –one of the most beautiful places in Uzbekistan. Aydarkul is a home for many species of birds and mammals. You can go fishing and, if weather permits, swim in the clear water of Aydarkul. You will have a delicious lunch cooked of fresh fish at the lake. After lunch drive to Samarkand. Overnight in Samarkand hotel

Samarkand. Full day sightseeing tour in Samarkand with visits to Registan Square, Guri-Amir Mausoleum, Bibikhanum Mosque, Shakhi Zinda Necropolis, world famous Siyob Bazaar to try local delicacies and sweets. Overnight in Samarkand hotel

Samarkand. On our second full day in Samarkand, we take it slow and enjoy the city, with visits to Ulugbek Observatory, Afrosiab museum of the ancient town, paper production mill Meros located outside of the city which keeps the ancient methods of paper making. Overnight in Samarkand hotel

Samarkand to Tashkent. Morning at leisure in Samarkand to explore the town in depth. Lunch at a local Tajik family house (given as an option). Afternoon bullet train to Tashkent at 17:00-19:40. Our last night Hotel in Tashkent
Tashkent to London. Morning transfer to airport for flight back home.
